item.title: Newsite
item.description: Create a portfolio site (minimum expenditure & work) I created my portfolio site with Hugo, again! This time, with a plan and adequate free time, I was able to get it to a publishable version 1.0. There is almost no front-end development involved and zero back-end work too(I did work on the backend engine of verless, another static site generator, so not technically zero xD). item.title: My core beliefs
item.description: A few things I believe : Optimal states are a balance of options. Applies to all points below too First make things work, then make them perfect over iterations Work for things close to you before changing the world Careful planning in the start can save a lot of time later on Miscommunication is a major problem that we should work more on Success is determined by a mix of effort you put in and the opportunities you have

item.title: Expectations from this blog

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I’m a Third-year student at PES University studying Computer Science Engineering. Domains I’m majorly interested in - Cryptography Hacking around systems and distributed systems Quantum mechanics and quantum information science Algorithms (Discrete optimization, Game theory) Deep learning (reinforcement learning) I love hacking systems (not cracking them!) to learn how they work. I like Developer communities and collaborative learning too. My hobbies include Cycling, Drawing and reading Mystery books :)
